<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodline Conduit](/Feats.aspx?ID=6123) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 157 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per minute

</column>

---

Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells. If your next action is to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) of 5th rank or lower that has no duration, you don't expend the spell's slot when you cast it.
name: Bloodline Conduit
